Author: Joaquin Phoenix
Text: It takes nothing away from a human to be kind to an animal.

Author: Gary L. Francione
Text: Veganism is not a sacrifice. It is a joy.

Author: Cesar Chavez
Text: Only when we have become non—violent towards all life will we have learned to live well ourselves,

Author: Anonymous
Text: Animals are not products. Life doesn’t have a price.

Author: Dirk Verbeuren
Text: Every living creature has the right to live ethically.

Author: Anonymous
Text: All life deserves respect, dignity, and compassion. All life.

Author: Roy E. Disney
Text: It’s not hard to make decisions once you know what your values are.

Author: Buddha
Text: May all that have life be delivered from suffering.

Author: Haile Selassie
Text: It is much easier to show compassion to animals. They are never wicked.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Text: I personally chose to go vegan because I educated myself on factory farming and cruelty to animals, and I suddenly realized that what was on my plate were living things, with feelings. And I just couldn’t disconnect myself from it any longer.

Author: Gandhi
Text: The greatness of a nation and it’s moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated.

Author: Davegan Raza
Text: If you think that being vegan is difficult, imagine being a factory farmed animal.

Author: Anatole France
Text: Until one has loved an animal, a part of one’s soul remains unawakened.

Author: Russell Brand
Text: I don’t see why someone should lose their life just so you can have a snack.

Author: John Sakars
Text: To get mud off your hands, use soap and water. To get blood off your hands, go vegan.

Author: Chris Hannah (Propagandhi)
Text: Life is too short to make others shorter.

Author: Anonymous
Text: Animals are here with us, not for us.

Author: Albert Einstein
Text: The world is a dangerous place, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing.

Author: Jared Leto
Text: I’m a vegan. I respect the environment and I do my best to spread the importance of such an issue.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: The problem is that humans have victimized animals to such a degree that they are not even considered victims. They are not even considered at all. They are nothing; they don’t count; they don’t matter. They are commodities like TV sets and cell phones. We have actually turned animals into inanimate objects – sandwiches and shoes.

Author: James Cromwell
Text: If a kid ever realized what was involved in factory farming, they would never touch meat again.

Author: Morrisey
Text: Eating meat is the most disgusting thing I can think of. It’s like biting into your grandmother.

Author: Ghandi
Text: I hold that the more helpless a creature, the more entitled it is to protection by man from the cruelty of man

Author: Anonymous
Text: One to change a few. A few to change many. Many to change the world. Starts with one.

Author: Frank Ferrante
Text: As I improved my diet, I started to learn to love my self, probably for the first time ever.

Author: Charles Darwin
Text: There is no fundamental difference between man and animals in their ability to feel pleasure and pain, happiness, and misery.

Author: Tobey Maguire
Text: It’s never really been that hard for me. I’ve never had any desire to eat meat. In fact, when I was a kid I would have a really difficult time eating meat at all.

Author: Anonymous
Text: The only animals I eat are crackers.

Author: Peter Singer
Text: Animal factories are one more sign of the extent to which our technological capacities have advanced faster than our ethics.

Author: Leonardo Da Vinci
Text: My body will not be a tomb for other creatures.

Author: Anonymous
Text: World Peace begins in the kitchen.

Author: Moby
Text: Could you look an animal in the eyes and say to it, ‘My appetite is more important than your suffering’?

Author: Pino Caruso
Text: People eat meat and think they will become as strong as an ox, forgetting that the ox eats grass.

Author: Shaun Monson
Text: Please don’t refuse with your eyes what the animals endure with their bodies.

Author: Ellen Page
Text: Why are vegans made fun of while the inhumane factory farming process regards animals and the natural world merely as commodities to be exploited for profit?

Author: Anonymous
Text: Compassion is the best side effect of being vegan.

Author: Howard Lynan
Text: No animal needs to die in order for me to live. And that makes me feel good.

Author: Steve Simmons
Text: Science that fails to embrace all living beings is far more dangerous than any virus!

Author: K.D. Lang
Text: We all love animals. Why do we call some ‘pets’ and others ‘dinner?’

Author: Natalie Portman
Text: Everyone has to find what is right for them, and it is different for everyone. Eating for me is how you proclaim your beliefs three times a day. That is why all religions have rules about eating. Three times a day, I remind myself that I value life and do not want to cause pain to or kill other living beings. That is why I eat the way I do.

Author: Anthony Douglas Williams
Text: When humans act with cruelty we characterize them as animals, yet the only animal that displays cruelty is humanity.

Author: Alicia Silverstone
Text: I can’t think of anything better in the world to be but a vegan.

Author: Thomas Edison
Text: Non—violence leads to the highest ethics, which is the goal of all evolution. Until we stop harming all other living beings, we are still savages

Author: Paul McCartney
Text: When I see bacon, I see a pig, I see a little friend, and that’s why I can’t eat it. Simple as that.

Author: Hippocrates
Text: The soul is the same in all living creatures, although the body of each is different.

Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Text: Behind every beautiful fur coat, there is a story. It is a bloody, barbaric story.

Author: Cassey Afleck
Text: When people ask me why I don’t eat meat or any other animal products, I say, ‘Because they are unhealthy and they are the product of a violent and inhumane industry.'

Author: Kristen Bell
Text: Part of my becoming a vegetarian was that I would look at my burger, then look at my dogs, and I wasn’t able to see a difference.

Author: Alec Baldwin
Text: Every time sitting at a dining table, we make a choice. Please choose vegetarianism. Do it for the animals. Do it for the environment and for the sake of your own health.

Author: Peter Dinklage
Text: I love animals. All animals. I wouldn’t hurt a cat or a dog — or a chicken, or a cow. And I wouldn’t ask someone else to hurt them for me. That’s why I’m a vegetarian.

Author: Paul McCartney
Text: If slaughterhouses had glass walls, we’d all be vegetarian.

Author: Marie Sarantakis
Text: If you don’t like pictures of animal cruelty being posted on social media, you need to help stop the cruelty, not the pictures. You should be bothered that its happening, not that you saw it.

Author: Albert Einstein
Text: Nothing will benefit human health and increase chances for survival of life on Earth as much as the evolution to a vegetarian diet.

Author: Leonardo Da Vinci
Text: The time will come when men such as I will look upon the murder of animals as they now look upon the murder of men.

Author: Alice Walker
Text: The animals of the world exist for their own reasons. They were not made for humans any more than blacks were made for whites, or women for men.

Author: Plato
Text: The Gods created certain kinds of beings to replenish our bodies; they are the trees and the plants and the seeds.

Author: Charles Darwin
Text: The love for all living creatures is the most noble attribute of man.

Author: Anthony Douglas Williams
Text: No other animal on Earth has portrayed such a disregard for life than mankind.

Author: Michael Klaper
Text: People are the only animals that drink the milk of the mother of another species. All other animals stop drinking milk altogether after weaning. It is unnatural for a dog to nurse from a mother giraffe; it is just as unnatural for a human being to drink the milk of a cow.

Author: Moby
Text: If you don’t want to be beaten, imprisoned, mutilated, killed or tortured then you shouldn’t condone such behaviour towards anyone, be they human or not.

Author: Martin Buber
Text: An animal’s eyes have the power to speak a great language.

Author: Rachel Carson
Text: We cannot have peace among men whose hearts find delight in killing any living creature.

Author: Glenda Jackson
Text: Nobody really needs a mink coat… Except the mink.

Author: Ali Ibn Abi Taalib
Text: Nothing hurts a good soul and a kind heart more than to live amongst people who can’t understand it.

Author: Akbarali Jetha
Text: We choose to eat meat and have therefore built slaughter houses for the animals and hospitals for us.

Author: Rue McClanahan
Text: Cruelty is one fashion statement we can all do without.

Author: Harvey Diamond
Text: You put a baby in a crib with an apple and a rabbit. If it eats the rabbit and plays with the apple, I’ll buy you a new car.

Author: Jeremy Bentham
Text: The question is not, Can they reason? nor, Can they talk? but, Can they suffer?

Author: Anonymous
Text: It’s not a diet. It’s not a phase. It’s a permanent lifestyle.

Author: Ayurvedic proverb
Text: When diet is wrong, medicine is of no use. When diet is correct, medicine is of no need.

Author: Bhagavad Gita
Text: When you feel the suffering of every living thing in your own heart, that is consciousness.

Author: Anonymous
Text: If you can’t stand watching it be produced, you shouldn’t be eating it.

Author: Anonymous
Text: I didn’t change, I just woke up.

Author: Ricky Gervais
Text: Animals don’t have a voice, but I do. A loud one. A big fucking mouth. My voice is for them. And I’ll never shut up while they suffer.

Author: Einstein. Albert
Text: It almost seems to me that man was not born to be a carnivore.

Author: Anthony Douglas Williams
Text: Earth was created for all of us, not some of us.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Text: Animals are my friends. And I don’t eat my friends.

Author: Anonymous
Text: I am no longer accepting the things I cannot change. I am changing the things I cannot accept.

Author: Anonymous
Text: If you think eating meat is just a personal choice, you are forgetting someone.

Author: Maya Angelou
Text: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.

Author: Anonymous
Text: Vegan is not about being perfect. It is about doing the least harm and the most good.

Author: Dr. Paul Farmer
Text: The idea that some lives matter less is the root of all that is wrong in the world.

Author: Randy Sandberg
Text: Veganism is not about how hard it is for you. It’s about every animal’s right not to be used as a slave.

Author: JoAnne McArthur
Text: To face animal suffering is to face our responsibility in their suffering.

Author: James Wildman
Text: You can’t do anything violent humanely.

Author: Anonymous
Text: People may hate you for being different and not living by society’s standards but deep down, they wish they had the courage to do the same.

Author: Colleen Patrick
Text: It’s pretty amazing to wake up every morning, knowing that every decision I make is to cause as little harm as possible. It’s a pretty fantastic way to live.

Author: Anonymous
Text: Animal protection isn’t a radical idea. It follows the simple principle that if animals feel pain, joy and fear, they should be protected from suffering.

Author: Anonymous
Text: Fur coats are worn by beautiful animals and ugly people.

Author: Ruby Roth
Text: We strive for a world where every earthling has the right to live and grow. That’s why we don’t eat animals.

Author: Barbara Thompson
Text: Animals are not ingredients.

Author: Gandhi
Text: The future depends on what we do in the present.

Author: Jiminy Cricket
Text: Always let your conscience be your guide.

Author: Jodi Foster
Text: Cruelty might be very human, and it might be cultural, but it’s not acceptable.

Author: Travis Barker
Text: I’ve been vegan since I got out of the hospital… It’s another eye opener. It changed my life in a number of ways.

Author: Anonymous
Text: The future is not something we enter, the future is something we create.

Author: Pete Singer
Text: We are, quite literally, gambling with the future of our planet— for the sake of hamburgers.

Author: T. Casey Brennan
Text: Poor animals, how jealously they guard their bodies, for to us is merely an evening’s meal, but to them is life itself.

Author: Zoe Weil
Text: I am grateful to realize that my desires do not entitle me to add to another’s suffering.

Author: Jack Norris
Text: If intelligence and capability are not criteria for the possession of rights, why would animals —who have the capacity to feel fear and pain— be excluded from our moral consideration?

Author: Chris Hedges
Text: Becoming vegan is the most important and direct change we can immediately make to save the planet and its species.

Author: Mark Twain
Text: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it’s time to pause and reflect.

Author: Morrisey
Text: You either approve of violence or you don’t, and nothing on earth is more violent or extreme than the meat industry.

Author: Anonymous
Text: Start with your heart, and only good can follow!

Author: Bryan Adams
Text: The concept that you are not ingesting rotting flesh sort of sums it up for me.

Author: Mickey Madden
Text: I’m a really big lover of animals, and, at the risk of sounding like a total hippie, I do feel more connected to the world at large and to animals.

Author: Erykah Badu
Text: Vegan food is soul food in its truest form. Soul food means to feed the soul. And to me, your soul is your intent. If your intent is pure, you are pure.

Author: Uri Gellar
Text: The best part of being a vegan is the purity and peace of mind one experiences and the strong connection I feel to the animal kingdom.

Author: Steve
Text: Being a vegan just helps me build up my self—esteem. I feel good about it every time I eat a meal.

Author: Anonymous
Text: If you can be anything, be kind.

Author: Lea Michelle
Text: I’m a vegan. It makes me feel really good and bright.

Author: Alicia Silverstone
Text: Being vegan just gives you such great karma.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: It is not your right—based on YOUR traditions, YOUR customs and YOUR habits—to deny animals THEIR freedom so you can harm them, enslave them and kill them. Thats not what rights are about. Thats injustice. There is no counter—argument to veganism. Accept it. Apologize for the way you’ve been living. Make amends and move forward.

Author: Jill Robinson
Text: Consider that animals, like us, have one life. It is their life, their only life, and as important to them as our own life is to us.

Author: Bradley Miller
Text: Teaching a child not to step on a caterpillar is as valuable to the child as it is to the caterpillar.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Text: I choose not to make a graveyard of my body with the rotting corpses of dead animals.

Author: Steve
Text: Regardless of anyone’s dietary motivations, the healthiest lifestyle is the one that’s most compassionate.

Author: Hippocrates
Text: Let food be thy medicine, and medicine be thy food.

Author: Ann Wigmore
Text: The food you eat can either be the safest, most powerful form of medicine, or the slowest form of poison.

Author: Moby
Text: Intellectually, human beings and animals may be different, but it’s pretty obvious that animals have a rich emotional life and that they feel joy and pain. It’s easy to forget the connection between a hamburger and the cow it came from. But I forced myself to acknowledge the fact that every time I ate a hamburger, a cow had ceased to breathe.

Author: Ricky Gervais
Text: Whether you understand they evolved over billions of years or believe that a God made them all one afternoon, please be kind to animals.

Author: Evanna Lynch
Text: I’ve always abhorred violence and am highly sensitised to it. I do not think it benefits society or indeed any individual to become tolerant of violence… I feel if I can accept the abuse of these innocent, sentient creatures and my role in it then I could easily become apathetic about…well, everything, and that is a scary thought.

Author: Albert Schweitzer
Text: Until he extends the circle of his compassion to all living things, man will not himself find peace.

Author: Karen Pendergrass
Text: Medicine is not healthcare, food is healthcare. Medicine is sick care. Let’s all get that straight for a change.

Author: Michael Pollan
Text: Eat food. Not too much. Mostly plants.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: Protecting the weak is the first step to enlightenment and being truly civilized.

Author: Anonymous
Text: Eat your medicine.

Author: Robert Urich
Text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.

Author: Evanna Lynch
Text: Killing and eating animals is a betrayal of our own core humanity…killing an innocent goes against our nature.

Author: Jane Goodall
Text: You cannot get through a single day without having an impact on the world around you. What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

We are all animals of this planet. We are all creatures. And nonhuman animals experience pain sensations just like we do. They too are strong, intelligent, industrious, mobile, and evolutional. They too are capable of growth and adaptation. Like us, firsthand foremost, they are earthlings. And like us, they are surviving. Like us they also seek their own comfort rather than discomfort. And like us they express degrees of emotion. In short like us, they are alive.

Author: Betty White
Text: Animals are near and dear to my heart, and I’ve devoted my life to trying to improve their lives.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: How would you feel, if the day that you were born, somebody else had already planned the day of your execution?

Author: Liam Hemsworth
Text: After all the information I gathered about the mistreatment of animals, I couldn’t continue to eat meat.

Author: Jessica Chastain
Text: I’m a vegan. I don’t want to torture anything. I guess it’s about trying to live a life where I’m not contributing to the cruelty of the world.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Text: The average age of a meat—eater is 63. I am on the verge of 85 and still at work as hard as ever. I have lived quite long enough and am trying to die; but I simply cannot do it. A single beef—steak; would finish me; but I cannot bring myself to swallow it. I am oppressed with a dread of living forever. That is the only disadvantage of vegetarianism.

Author: Moby
Text: Basically we should stop doing those things that are destructive to the environment, other creatures, and ourselves and figure out new ways of existing.

Author: Romesh Ranganathan
Text: If you look at veganism, and question how we do things, and how we should be living, veganism, to me, seems like the logical way.

Author: Tim Shieff
Text: When I became vegan I stopped training for myself and started training with a purpose greater than my own. Veganism for me is about mindfulness. I do this to liberate animals.

Author: Ariana Grande
Text: All animals should live happily and safely.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: If it’s not good enough for your eyes, why is it good enough for your stomach?

Our thinking about non—human animals is very confused, and people who have chosen to live a cruelty—free plant—based lifestyle are baffled as to why other people have not made the connection. Many of us live with companion animals such as dogs, cats, and rabbits. We share our homes with them, consider them members of the family and we grieve when they die. Yet we kill and eat other animals who, if you really think about it, are no different from the ones we love.

Author: Miley Cyrus
Text: Be the voice of those who can’t say …..’stop.’ Who can’t say ‘that hurts.’ Who can’t say ‘I’m so afraid to die.’ Be the voice of the animals!

Author: Ricky Gervais
Text: Wearing cosmetics that were tested on animals makes you ugly on the inside.

Author: Ed Templeton
Text: The health reasons are staggering! Do it also to take yourself out of the cycle of killing and abuse to living things. Show some compassion, and act on it.

Author: Bryan Adams
Text: My motto has always been ‘If you love animals, don’t eat them’ … The moment I began to understand what was going on with the treatment of animals, it led me more and more in the way of the path I am [on] now, which is a complete vegan.

Author: Neal D. Barnard
Text: The beef industry has contributed to more American deaths than all the wars of this century, all natural disasters, and all auto—mobile accidents combined. If beef is your idea of real food for real people you’d better live real close to a real good hospital.

Author: Carl Lewis
Text: I’ve found that a person does not need protein from meat to be a successful athlete. In fact, my best year of track competition was the first year I ate a vegan diet.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: No human influenced me to become vegan. The screaming, terrified, enslaved animals were the only influence needed.

Author: Jane Goodall
Text: Farm animals are far more aware and intelligent than we ever imagined and, despite having been bred as domestic slaves, they are individual beings in their own right. As such, they deserve our respect. And our help. Who will plead for them if we are silent?

Author: T. Colin Campbell
Text: What you eat every day is a far more powerful determinant of your health than your DNA or most of the nasty chemicals lurking in your environment.

Author: Lucy Watson
Text: As someone who loves animals, when I hear about a process that involves animal cruelty, I no longer want to be associated with it. Aside from the animal cruelty aspect of the meat/dairy industries, there are many health benefits associated with turning vegan, much to many people’s surprise.

Author: Dr. Michael Greger
Text: The most ethical diet just so happens to be the most environmentally sound diet and just so happens to be the healthiest.

Author: James Cameron
Text: It’s not a requirement to eat animals, we just choose to do it, so it becomes a moral choice and one that is having a huge impact on the planet, using up resources and destroying the biosphere.

Author: Moby
Text: There are viable (and usually better) alternatives to the use of animals for food, sport, clothing, & experimentation. I beg you to discontinue any actions that might cause or condone animal torture, abuse, or destruction.

Author: David Carter
Text: Becoming vegan has given me a greater purpose, something bigger than myself to fight for, and fight I will.

Author: Dr. John McDougall
Text: People feel poorly because they are nourished by foods you wouldn’t feed to your dog and cat. The rich western diet is full of fat, sugar, cholesterol, salt, animal protein — all the wrong foods for people.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: You know what’s more insane than slaughterhouses? Meat eaters. Walking around, acting like their lifestyle isn’t causing any harm.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Text: The worst sin toward our fellow creatures is not to hate them, but to be indifferent to them: that’s the essence of inhumanity.

Author: Pythagoras
Text: For as long as men massacre animals, they will kill each other. Indeed, he who sows the seed of murder and pain cannot reap joy and love.

Author: Steve
Text: I got into being vegan because I was simply looking to benefit from being more compassionate. I have since come to learn that it is an animal—based diet that is responsible for the overwhelming majority of cases of cancer, heart disease, diabetes, obesity, multiple sclerosis, and all kinds of other problems.

Author: Ariana Grande
Text: I am a firm believer in eating a full plant—based, whole food diet that can expand your life length and make you an all—around happier person.

Author: Waka Flocka Flame
Text: I just didn’t want to be fat. I got tired of breathing hard. I got tired of my joints hurting. I just got tired of being lied to.

Author: T. Colin Campbell
Text: Everything in food works together to create health or disease. The more we think that a single chemical characterizes a whole food, the more we stray into idiocy.

Author: Russell Simmons
Text: We need to realize that these are beings that suffer the same as we suffer. They want freedom the way we want freedom.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: Stop filtering your nutrients through somebody else’s body.

Author: Joaquin Phoenix
Text: Animal rights is a part of my everyday life. When you live by example, you create a certain level of awareness. Friends of mine – people I have never discussed animal rights or vegetarianism with – are adopting vegetarian habits because they see it.

Author: Kat Von D
Text: Veganism changed me. It taught me to look past myself. To consider how my choices effect others. The animals, the people around me, and the planet we live on.

Author: Joanne McArthur
Text: I hope someday everyone will care about all animals, not just the ‘cute and cuddly’ ones.

Author: Alan Watts
Text: Cows scream louder than carrots.

Author: Peter Dinklage
Text: Animals on factory farms all face pain and fear, just like the animals we share our homes with, yet are repeatedly abused in shocking ways.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: It’s not about loving animals. It’s about fighting injustice. My whole goal is for humans to have as little contact as possible with animals.

Author: César Chávez
Text: We know we cannot be kind to animals until we stop exploiting them — exploiting animals in the name of science, exploiting animals in the name of sport, exploiting animals in the name of fashion, and yes, exploiting animals in the name of food.

Author: Rich Roll
Text: I always say that eating a plant based diet is the secret weapon of enhanced athletic performance.

Author: Thích Nhất Hạnh
Text: By eating meat we share the responsibility of climate change, the destruction of our forests, and the poisoning of our air and water. The simple act of becoming a vegetarian will make a difference in the health of our planet.

Author: Mohandas Gandhi
Text: I hold that the more helpless a creature, the more entitled it is to protection by man from the cruelty of man

Author: Buddha
Text: One should not kill a living being, nor cause it to be killed, nor should one incite another to kill. Do not injure any being, either strong or weak, in the world.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: Every time you have a glass of cow milk, some calf is not.

Author: T. Colin Campbell
Text: Every kilogram of beef requires 100,000 liters of water to produce. By comparison, a kilogram of wheat requires just 900 liters, and a kilogram of potatoes just 500 liters.

Author: Ricky Gervais
Text: Animals are not here for us to do as we please with. We are not their superiors, we are their equals. We are their family. Be kind to them.

Author: Franz Kafka
Text: Now I can look at you in peace; I don’t eat you any more.

Author: Albert Einstein
Text: It is my view that the vegetarian manner of living, by its purely physical effect on the human temperament, would most beneficially influence the lot of mankind.

Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Text: I did not become a vegetarian for my health, I did it for the health of the chickens.

Author: Albert Schweitzer
Text: Think occasionally of the suffering of which you spare yourself the sight.

Author: Gary Yourofsky
Text: What we must do is start viewing every cow, pig, chicken, monkey, rabbit, mouse, and pigeon as our family members.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Text: A man of my spiritual intensity does not eat corpses.

Author: Miley Cyrus
Text: If you choose to eat meat… you love PETS not ANIMALS.

Author: Ariana Grande
Text: I love animals more than I love most people. Not kidding.

Author: Steve
Text: Being a vegan just helps me build up my self—esteem. I feel good about it every time I eat a meal.

Author: Rai Aren
Text: I made the choice to be vegan because I will not eat (or wear, or use) anything that could have an emotional response to its death or captivity. I can well imagine what that must feel like for our non—human friends – the fear, the terror, the pain – and I will not cause such suffering to a fellow living being.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Text: You have just dined, and however scrupulously the slaughterhouse is concealed in the graceful distance of miles, there is complicity.

Author: James Cromwell
Text: We don’t need to eat anyone who would run, swim, or fly away if he could.

Author: Jane Goodall
Text: Thousands of people who say they ‘love’ animals sit down once or twice a day to enjoy the flesh of creatures who have been utterly deprived of everything that could make their lives worth living and who endured the awful suffering and the terror of the abattoirs.

Author: James Cameron
Text: This may surprise you, because it surprised me when I found out, but the single biggest thing an individual can do to combat climate change is to stop eating animals.

Author: Irene M. Pepperberg
Text: Clearly, animals know more than we think, and think a great deal more than we know.

Author: Kim Basinger
Text: If you could see or feel the suffering, you wouldn’t think twice. Give back life. Don’t eat meat.

Author: Eckhart Tolle
Text: Compassion is the awareness of a deep bond between yourself and all creatures.

Author: Prince
Text: No member of the animal kingdom ever did a thing to me. It’s why I don’t eat red meat or white fish. Don’t give me no blue cheese. We’re all members of the animal kingdom. Leave your brothers and sisters in the sea.

Author: Sharon Gannon
Text: Don’t wait for a better world. Start now to create a world of harmony and peace. It is up to you, and it always has been. You may even find the solution at the end of your fork.

Author: Virchand Gandhi
Text: The heart of vegetarians is healed sooner than those of flesh—eaters.

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Text: Who are we to say dogs and cats have more rights than cows and pigs. They’re all conscious. They feel the same. They hurt the same. God help us understand!

Author: Élisée Reclus
Text: The horse and the cow, the rabbit and the cat, the deer and the hare, the pheasant and the lark, please us better as friends than as meat.

Author: J. Adam Snyder
Text: Mankind does not have dominion over the Earth, mankind has a relationship with the Earth.

Author: Jenn V Keller-Lowe
Text: Look into their eyes and tell them "I’m sorry, you have to die, but I need to eat". Look into their eyes, and tell them "I know there is an abundance of plant based foods I could eat, but I would still rather eat you". Look into their eyes and tell them "I know I don’t NEED to eat you, but I am going to pay someone else to murder you anyway" Look into their eyes and tell them "I’m sorry you lived a short enslaved, abused and tortured life, but I don’t care because I am selfish. Look into their eyes and tell them "I love my cat/dog, but your life doesn't matter as much." Go ahead, take a look into their eyes and tell them that!

Author: Ian Somerhalder
Text: Animal cruelty is one of the most unfortunate and barbaric demonstrations of human beings manipulating ill conceived notions of ‘power’ over other species.

Author: Ricky Gervais
Text: If you enjoy seeing an animal terrified or in pain, then you are a cunt.

Author: Dr. Kim Allan Williams
Text: There are two kinds of cardiologists: vegans and those who haven’t read the data.

Author: Pythagoras
Text: Animals share with us the privilege of having a soul.

Author: Jane Goodall
Text: If we kill off the wild, then we are killing a part of our souls.

Author: Evan Baldonado
Text: Fed by plants, fed up with the world.

Author: Alicia Silverstone
Text: Being vegan helped me realize I can say and do what I believe is right. That is powerful.

Author: Richard Gere
Text: People get offended by animal rights campaigns. It’s ludicrous. It’s not as bad as mass animal death in factory.
